author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
We check out the prototypes for the latest Wand Company Pip-Boy prop replicas! Chris Barnardo from The Wand Company visits the workshop to show us how this Pip-Boy--inspired by the ones from Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas--was meticulously designed and has much more interactivity and functionality than their previous versions. We learn how an electronic prop replica like this is developed and the purpose for each prototype model. 

Learn more about The Wand Company's Pip-Boy 3000: https://www.thewandcompany.com/pip-boy-3000/
The open-source software project that powers these Pip-Boys: https://youtu.be/Hhz2hXtUeqg
Our mod of the Fallout TV Show Pip-Boy: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qjormNZqScc

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC
title: Hands-On with The Fallout 3 Pip-Boy 3000 Working Replica!
